title: Ep. #29 | Eric Nam, ATEEZ, KARD, and LAMBC
description:
Happy Monday, Daebak Fam! This week, we cover Ateez’s “Wonderland," Kard’s "Dumb Litty," LAMBC’s “Prayer,” and Eric’s newly released single “Love Die Young."

Want to know the story behind this tear-jerking ballad? Eric explains what inspired him while writing for the new album and his feelings at the time. Listen carefully to uncover Daebak Show’s next special guest and Eric’s upcoming plans in the U.S.

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.

Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at https://divestudios.io/daebakshow !

#ateez #wonderland #kard #dumblitty #LAMBC #prayer #LDY #lovedieyoung #ericnam #daebakshow #divestudios
